settings.title: Settings
settings.darkModeDescription: Toggle dark theme for the app window.

logs.title: Application Logs
logs.description: Opens the folder where recent app logs are stored.

modsStorage.title: Mods Storage
modsStorage.description: Opens the folder where imported mods are stored.

language.title: Language
language.description: Choose your preferred language. Overrides system detection on restart.

tooltips.conflicts: Check for file conflicts between mods
tooltips.restore: Roll back to a previous backup

gameDir.tooltip: The FM26 installation folder containing the .bundle files
gameDir.placeholder: Not set - click Select or Detect Game

userDir.label: User Directory:
userDir.tooltip: The FM26 User Directory where saves and settings are stored

nameFix.title: Name Fix
nameFix.subtitle: Manage FM Name Fix
nameFix.sectionDescription: Fixes licensing issues and unlocks real names for clubs, players, and competitions

whatItDoes.heading: What it does:
bullets: Unlocks real names for clubs like AC Milan, Inter, and Lazio
Works with all leagues and competitions

nameFix.noSources: No name fix sources available. Import a name fix ZIP file to get started.

warnings.needGameDir: Please set your Game Directory first

notes.community: You can download name fixes from the community or create your own. We recommend fixes from our friends at SortItOutSI or FMScout

userDir.label: User Directory:
userDir.tooltip: The FM26 User Directory where saves and settings are stored
